message: I head outside. According to my Coil, it's 3 PM. The back streets are full of people.
There are several routes I could take to get to the courier.
While considering which would be fastest, I reach into my shoulder bag and pull out a soft, furry lump.
The ball of fur is still asleep. I press my palm against his forehead to wake him up.
At the sound of his name, he promptly opens his eyes.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I need to get to the courier. Can you give me the quickest route?"
Ren gently touches my upper arm with his paws.

name: 蓮
message: "Road 241 East is blocked for police inspection. Buses are cancelled for maintenance. It'll be quicker to bypass the north terminal."
I pat Ren on the head. He barks and wags his tail.
I put on my headphones and push play.
